00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Stats
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025

00040 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042  SUBROUTINE Stats
00043 
00044 ! Common Variables
00045  USE NTypes,      ONLY : DBL
00046  USE Domain,      ONLY : invInitVol, invPi, iStep, now, xl, xu, yl, yu, zl, zu
00047  USE FluidParams, ONLY : phi
00048  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : g
00049  USE MPIParams,   ONLY : master, MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc
00050  USE MPI
00051  IMPLICIT NONE
00052 
00053 !  Local Variables
00054  INTEGER :: i, j, k
00055  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00056  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: ux, uy, uz, rhon, invRhon
00057  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invVol, Ref, Vef, Vol
00058  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:4) :: dataLocal, dataGlobal
00059 
00060 ! Initialize
00061  dataLocal(:)  = 0.D0
00062  dataGlobal(:) = 0.D0
00063 
00064 ! Loop through all nodes inside the drop for the current processor, vproc
00065  DO k = zl, zu
00066    DO j = yl, yu
00067      DO i = xl, xu
00068 
00069        rhon    = SUM( g(i,j,k,:,now) )
00070        invRhon = 1.D0/rhon
00071 
00072 ! Calculate the velocity
00073        ux = ( g(i,j,k, 1,now) - g(i,j,k, 2,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00074           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) + g(i,j,k, 9,now) - g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00075           +   g(i,j,k,11,now) - g(i,j,k,12,now) + g(i,j,k,13,now) &
00076           -   g(i,j,k,14,now) )*invRhon
00077 
00078        uy = ( g(i,j,k, 3,now) - g(i,j,k, 4,now) + g(i,j,k, 7,now) &
00079           -   g(i,j,k, 8,now) - g(i,j,k, 9,now) + g(i,j,k,10,now) &
00080           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) + g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00081           -   g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00082 
00083        uz = ( g(i,j,k, 5,now) - g(i,j,k, 6,now) + g(i,j,k,11,now) &
00084           -   g(i,j,k,12,now) - g(i,j,k,13,now) + g(i,j,k,14,now) &
00085           +   g(i,j,k,15,now) - g(i,j,k,16,now) - g(i,j,k,17,now) &
00086           +   g(i,j,k,18,now) )*invRhon
00087 
00088 ! Calculate the accumulated quantities
00089        IF ( phi(i,j,k) >= 0.D0 ) THEN
00090          dataLocal(1) = dataLocal(1) + 1.D0
00091          dataLocal(2) = dataLocal(2) + ux
00092          dataLocal(3) = dataLocal(3) + uy
00093          dataLocal(4) = dataLocal(4) + uz
00094        END IF
00095 
00096      END DO
00097    END DO
00098  END DO
00099 
00100 ! Gather global information
00101  CALL MPI_ALLREDUCE(dataLocal, dataGlobal, 4, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00102  Vol    = dataGlobal(1)
00103  invVol = 1.D0/Vol
00104 
00105 ! Define average velocity of the drop and effective radius and volume
00106  ux  = dataGlobal(2)*invVol
00107  uy  = dataGlobal(3)*invVol
00108  uz  = dataGlobal(4)*invVol
00109  Ref = ( Vol*invPi*0.75D0 )**(1.D0/3.D0)
00110  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00111 
00112 ! Save velocity and effective radius and volume data from the master node only
00113  IF( vproc == master ) THEN
00114    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "stats.out", STATUS = "UNKNOWN", POSITION = "APPEND",&
00115         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00116    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00117      WRITE(10,'(I9,7ES19.9)')iStep,ux,uy,uz,Vef,Ref
00118      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00119    ELSE
00120      CALL MemAlloc(2)
00121      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00122      STOP "Error: Unable to open output file 'stats.out'."
00123    END IF
00124  END IF
00125 
00126  RETURN
00127  END SUBROUTINE Stats
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:28 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
